on_join_message: Hello and welcome! Please let me know what I can help you with and a team of highly-experienced experts will contact you back as soon as possible. Please allow a few minutes so that we can craft a personalized response to your query. You can ask for information about Wells, questions about our website, or jump right into your Wells question.
on_away_response: Currently, all our humans are busy. We will get back to you as soon as possible!
on_help_response: Let us know how we can help and we will send the message through to our team of human experts. Please wait as we get back to you as soon as possible.
on_teams_response: Your response has been received by our human team and you will be notified as soon as there is a response.
